other_tests.findings: Nonvariola orthopoxvirus detected in vesicular scrapings and viral culture supernatant from the patientâ€™s skin lesions using PCR tests.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Vaccinia virus DNA load showed a decreasing trend from day 7 onward and was undetectable at day 18.

other_tests.findings: Initial dose of 6000 IU/kg was administered.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Total cumulative dose reached 24,000 IU/kg over the course of treatment.

other_tests.findings: 5 mg/kg of cidofovir was administered after deterioration of the patient's condition.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subsequent doses were not required due to improving clinical condition.

other_tests.findings: ST-246, an investigational agent, was administered at a dose of 5 mg/kg.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Treatment was discontinued after 14 days as the patient's clinical situation improved with decreasing viral load.

other_tests.findings: Hematologic complications including neutropenia, anemia, and thrombocytopenia; all complications resolved.
